data.why:
While developing a web based interface using PHP the need arose to
    share sessions between servers. I implimented this by storing the
    sessions in a MySQL database. Then came the problem of reading the
    sessions from Perl. I found the PHP::Session module on CPAN and it
    worked great only it reads from the file system, not a MySQL
    database. So I modfied the PHP::Session module and created
    PHP::MySQL_Session useing the same session serializer as
    PHP::Session .
